name: tm81
effect: Teaches X-Scissor to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches X-Scissor to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black-white: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.
